body.name: Sycoodeal Office Chair Mat for Hardwood/ Tile Floor,Computer Gaming Chair Mat,Large Floor Protector Rug,Anti-Slip,Easy to Clean,Black(48"x36")

Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 21 mins
features: █【Non-slip & Move Steadily】:Sycoodeal Chair Mat Made of upgraded version TPR adsorbed material,ultra non-slip.a material that allows the office chair to roll smoothly on the chair rug.No crease,no curl,no fading. It came folded into a small square,please iron out the wrinkles.IMPROTANT TIP: THIS CHAIR MAT IS NOT SUITABLE FOR USE ON CARPET

█【Effectively Protective Floor】:Floor gets scuffed,dirty and old looking if your chair rolls over it day after day.The chair mat prevents wear and tear on your wheels or floor,such as hardwood,tile and prolong their service life.It also help reducing the noise of rolling chair,even playing games or working at night will not affect the others.

█【Perfect size & thickness】:The chair mat:size 48" x 36"; Thickness: 1/6" (Manual Measurement). Large enough to allow the chairs to roll freely on the floor mat, protecting your floor from being scratched by the tables and chairs, Note: It is in the box. When using it for the first time, You can put some books on the four corners of the mat to help it flat more quickly.

█【Easy to clean】:Clean the ground first.Please ensure the chair mat and floor are completely dry and clean, Note: White TPR contact flooring,and put it on the floor,press lightly so it can gently stick to the floor.If the surface of the chair mat is dirty,you can use the vacuum cleaner directly to clean.Looks great and the perfect match to any office/desk.

█【Wide Application】:Not Only office chair mat is used for hardwood floor,vinyl,hardwood,laminate,stone,tile and concrete.but also you can cut it to make it fit the floor perfectly according to your needs,such as office,hallway,living room and study.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Modern Comfort Floor Protection Create a beautiful,functional space where you can do your work all in it!Office Desk Chair Mats for Hard Floors are designed with a sleek,modern look that can instantly upgrade your workspace.

We all know that you just can't stay perfectly still while sitting at your desk.You need to roll your chair to reach distant items and stand up occasionally.If you're wondering why you feel so tired even if you're just sitting at your desk,this is the main reason.To solve this problem. You need to put a protective chair mat under your desk chair.It provides a smooth surface for your chair's casters and move much easier.Working at your desk will then be as trouble-free as it should be.

Anti-slip & Steady The desk chair mat protects the floor from being damaged by the chair legs and casters.It allows the chair casters to move smoothly instead of grabbing the feet or casters on the mat. Our chair mat can also help you eliminate the rolling noise of office chair wheels,giving you a quiet and comfortable office environment.
The floor protection mat is suitable for many places (offices,workstation,living room,table and other furniture,etc.)
Multiple cleaning methods If the surface of the chair mat is dirty, you can use the vacuum cleaner directly to clean. Looks great and the perfect match to any office/desk.
The chair mats for home can enhance your room decor and add beauty to your home.

HIMOON Pillows HIMOON Memory Foam Pillow HIMOON Pillows Sycoodeal Office Chair Mat HIMOON Pillows HIMOON Memory Foam Pillow Material Polyester + Top-end Microfiber Memory Foam+Polyester Polyester + Top-end Microfiber PVC Polyester + Top-end Microfiber Memory Foam+Polyester Size Variations Standard -Queen - King Standard -Queen - King Standard -Queen - King 48"x36" Standard -Queen - King Standard -Queen - King Color Variations Grey - Golden Grey Grey-Black-White Clear Grey white Machine/Hand wash Yes Yes Yes Hand wash Yes Yes Uses Aldult Aldult Aldult Home & Office Aldult Aldult Great Support & Soft Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes Yes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice desk mat, but it attracts many particles
reviews.reviewText: I brought the desk mat because my chair (has wheels) was destroying the floor. After using it, it prevented further damages to the tiles, but it was collecting many particles such as dust. My chair is able to move smoothly across the surface with no resistance and the mat stayed in place 90% of the time. If your floor is squeaky, this product does not silence the sound. The product is easy to use and easy to clean. There is a small chance you will get static shocked if you are holding the mat and touching a metallic surface.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The pad does protect my laminate wood floor. Use under my desk chair. Just tends to move a little to much after a while. So I keep having to put back in place. Chair rolls over the pad o.k. Does the job for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bait and switch ? ? ? ? Okey! I screwed up here.
reviews.reviewText: This arrived in good shape and all but they said it was 1/2 inch thick. Maybe I missed something here but this, at is 1/8" thick.It is clean, strong and looks good.Buuuuuuut YOU GUYS LIED TO ME!I am not going through all of the hassle of returning it because i need something - NOW.Yet you have lost a customer here. Unless you wish to explain this to me.CharlesPost script.It would appear that I do not read English very well though I was raised here in America.The post told me that it was 1/12" thick NOT 1/2" thick. This is MY fault not the companies, Everything is good and my butt is spanked.Thank you very much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: In fairness, I am still trying to smooth this flat. It was packed and shipped in a package about 8 in. X 10 in. This formed creases, 20. I'm still trying to smooth them out. But, it's only been a week of stepping on it, wetting and drying it, rolling it, letting it hang free etc. But, it also moves under my desk chair on my carpet. Is it inexpensive enough? Yes. Will it flatten itself? Don't know. But I bought a clear plastic replacement already.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product at 50% of other competitor's price
reviews.reviewText: Bought this hard floor pad so as to avoid my office chair wheels scratching my wood floor. I bought this because this is 50% of the cost of other products, including from Costco. THe product arrived on time, rolled up. Initially was difficult to un-roll and very hard. Once forcefully unrolled, I flipped it over and placed heavy objects, one at each corner to keep the shape. The thing unrolled itself and was useable in 2 hours.Overall, very happy w/ the purchase at 50% of the cost - it's a piece of floor matt on the floor so why pay so much more ?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality & good looking functional mat for office chairs!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This product is overall very good quality. Looks elegant and is a well-built mat. There are no comprises done. Recommended for anyone for office needs. It's very useful to move the chair smoothly especially if you have carpet in the office room & also collect the items falling from the chair and easy to clean as well.My 2 cents below :Pros:- Thoughtful design and very functional product overall by protecting the floor & even making the chair operation smooth - Great build quality. From stitching to the material- Size is appropriate for the purpose- Easy to fold/unfold and use- Base is anti-slip and sits well on the floor- Multiple color options are available to choose from- Very reasonably priced for this qualityCons:- None that I see for this price & the quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Sizing not accurate, difficult to roll chair on
reviews.reviewText: Listing states the product is 48" x 36", this is not accurate. The actual dimensions are 47" x 35", while admittedly this is a small difference, the reason I chose this option is because it WOULD have been a perfect fit had the description been correct. However with an inch gap on all sides my application looked out of place.I verified this was not due to stretching and shrinking, both dimensions were EXACTLY 1" off on all sides. This leads me to believe this is intentional.Additionally it's pretty difficult to move an office chair on this mat while seated, I would compare it to rolling an office chair on heavily padded carpet. Note I was using mine on hardwood floors and It still takes considerable effort, and often times I opt to stand up out of the chair and move it with my hands instead of remaining seated and dragging the chair forward with my legs (like I think most do in an office chair)Overall, for $15 its not a bad value if you just need the bare minimum protection for your floors.That being said probably wouldn't buy this mat again unless I was looking for the lowest budget possible.
